TYRRHENIAN SEA.
SARDINIA TO ITALY.
DNC 08, DNC 09.
14 METER M/V ALMA LIBRE II, WHITE HULL, TWO PERSONS
ON BOARD, UNREPORTED SARDINIA (40-55N 009-32E)
TO PONTINE ISLANDS (40-54N 012-58E). LAST KNOWN
POSITION IN VICINITY 40-32N 009-51E AT 221140Z APR.
VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP
LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO MRCC ROME,
INMARSAT-C: 424744220,
PHONE: 3906 5908 4527, 3906 5908 4409,
FAX: 390 6592 2737, 3906 5908 4793,
E-MAIL: ITMRCC@MIT.GOV.IT.
